verses.verse: And the fifth <S%G3991><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded, <S%G4537><s%> and I saw <S%G1492><s%> a star <S%G792><s%> fall <S%G4098><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> to the earth: <S%G1093><s%> and to him was given <S%G1325><s%> the key <S%G2807><s%> of the bottomless <S%G12><s%> pit. <S%G5421><s%>

And he opened <S%G455><s%> the bottomless <S%G12><s%> pit; <S%G5421><s%> and there arose <S%G305><s%> a smoke <S%G2586><s%> out of the pit, <S%G5421><s%> as the smoke <S%G2586><s%> of a great <S%G3173><s%> furnace; <S%G2575><s%> and the sun <S%G2246><s%> and the air <S%G109><s%> were darkened <S%G4654><s%> by reason <S%G1537><s%> of the smoke <S%G2586><s%> of the pit. <S%G5421><s%>

And there came <S%G1831><s%> out of the smoke <S%G2586><s%> locusts <S%G200><s%> on the earth: <S%G1093><s%> and to them was given <S%G1325><s%> power, <S%G1849><s%> as the scorpions <S%G4651><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> power. <S%G1849><s%>

And it was commanded <S%G4483><s%> them that they should not hurt <S%G91><s%> the grass <S%G5528><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> neither any <S%G3956><s%> green <S%G5515><s%> thing, neither any <S%G3956><s%> tree; <S%G1186><s%> but only <S%G3441><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> men <S%G444><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> not the seal <S%G4973><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in their foreheads. <S%G3359><s%>

And to them it was given <S%G1325><s%> that they should not kill <S%G615><s%> them, but that they should be tormented <S%G928><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> months: <S%G3376><s%> and their torment <S%G929><s%> was as the torment <S%G929><s%> of a scorpion, <S%G4651><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> he strikes <S%G3817><s%> a man. <S%G444><s%>

And in those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> shall men <S%G444><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> and shall not find <S%G2147><s%> it; and shall desire <S%G1937><s%> to die, <S%G599><s%> and death <S%G2288><s%> shall flee <S%G5343><s%> from them.

And the shapes <S%G3667><s%> of the locusts <S%G200><s%> were like <S%G3664><s%> to horses <S%G2462><s%> prepared <S%G2090><s%> to battle; <S%G4171><s%> and on <S%G1909><s%> their heads <S%G2776><s%> were as it were crowns <S%G4735><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> gold, <S%G5557><s%> and their faces <S%G4383><s%> were as the faces <S%G4383><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>
And they had <S%G2192><s%> hair <S%G2359><s%> as the hair <S%G2359><s%> of women, <S%G1135><s%> and their teeth <S%G3599><s%> were as the teeth of lions. <S%G3023><s%>

And they had <S%G2192><s%> breastplates, <S%G2382><s%> as it were breastplates <S%G2382><s%> of iron; <S%G4603><s%> and the sound <S%G5456><s%> of their wings <S%G4420><s%> was as the sound <S%G5456><s%> of chariots <S%G716><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> horses <S%G2462><s%> running <S%G5143><s%> to battle. <S%G4171><s%>

And they had <S%G2192><s%> tails <S%G3769><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> to scorpions, <S%G4651><s%> and there were stings <S%G2759><s%> in their tails: <S%G3769><s%> and their power <S%G1849><s%> was to hurt <S%G91><s%> men <S%G444><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> months. <S%G3376><s%>

And they had <S%G2192><s%> a king <S%G935><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them, which is the angel <S%G32><s%> of the bottomless <S%G12><s%> pit, whose <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> in the Hebrew <S%G1447><s%> tongue <S%G1447><s%> is Abaddon, <S%G3><s%> but in the Greek <S%G1673><s%> tongue has <S%G2192><s%> his name <S%G3686><s%> Apollyon. <S%G623><s%>

One <S%G3391><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> is past; <S%G565><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> there come <S%G2064><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> woes <S%G3759><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> hereafter. <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%>

And the sixth <S%G1623><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded, <S%G4537><s%> and I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from the four <S%G5064><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> of the golden <S%G5552><s%> altar <S%G2379><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is before <S%G1799><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

Saying <S%G3004><s%> to the sixth <S%G1623><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the trumpet, <S%G4536><s%> Loose <S%G3089><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are bound <S%G1210><s%> in the great <S%G3173><s%> river <S%G4215><s%> Euphrates. <S%G2166><s%>

And the four <S%G5064><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> were loosed, <S%G3089><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were prepared <S%G2090><s%> for an hour, <S%G5610><s%> and a day, <S%G2250><s%> and a month, <S%G3376><s%> and a year, <S%G1763><s%> for to slay <S%G615><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> part of men. <S%G444><s%>

And the number <S%G706><s%> of the army <S%G4753><s%> of the horsemen <S%G2461><s%> were two <S%G1417><s%> hundred <S%G3461><s%> thousand <S%G3461><s%> thousand: <S%G3461><s%> and I heard <S%G191><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of them.

And thus <S%G3779><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> the horses <S%G2462><s%> in the vision, <S%G3706><s%> and them that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them, having <S%G2192><s%> breastplates <S%G2382><s%> of fire, <S%G4447><s%> and of jacinth, <S%G5191><s%> and brimstone: <S%G2306><s%> and the heads <S%G2776><s%> of the horses <S%G2462><s%> were as the heads <S%G2776><s%> of lions; <S%G3023><s%> and out of their mouths <S%G4750><s%> issued <S%G1607><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> and smoke <S%G2586><s%> and brimstone. <S%G2303><s%>

By these <S%G5130><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> was the third <S%G5154><s%> part of men <S%G444><s%> killed, <S%G615><s%> by the fire, <S%G4442><s%> and by the smoke, <S%G2586><s%> and by the brimstone, <S%G2303><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> issued <S%G1607><s%> out of their mouths. <S%G4750><s%>

For their power <S%G1849><s%> is in their mouth, <S%G4750><s%> and in their tails: <S%G3769><s%> for their tails <S%G3769><s%> were like <S%G3664><s%> to serpents, <S%G3789><s%> and had <S%G2192><s%> heads, <S%G2776><s%> and with them they do hurt. <S%G91><s%>

And the rest <S%G3062><s%> of the men <S%G444><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> were not killed <S%G615><s%> by these <S%G5025><s%> plagues <S%G4127><s%> yet repented <S%G3340><s%> not of the works <S%G2041><s%> of their hands, <S%G5495><s%> that they should not worship <S%G4352><s%> devils, <S%G1140><s%> and idols <S%G1497><s%> of gold, <S%G5552><s%> and silver, <S%G693><s%> and brass, <S%G5470><s%> and stone, <S%G3035><s%> and of wood: <S%G3585><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> see, <S%G991><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> hear, <S%G191><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> walk: <S%G4043><s%>

Neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> repented <S%G3340><s%> they of their murders, <S%G5408><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> of their sorceries, <S%G5331><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> of their fornication, <S%G4202><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> of their thefts. <S%G2809><s%>
